name: overstealth
description:
There is a new exhibition in your local museum. But who needs to buy a ticket if you got an invisibility lotion!

°overstealth is a stealth game without hiding. You are invisible and only your missteps will tell you where you are. Try not to get caught, or you have to buy a ticket(!)

controls:
wasd or left stick to move
x (keyboard) or x (controller) to admire the art

team member:
https://josia-roncancio.itch.io/
http://moritzsteinbeck.com/

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2018
https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2018
